attributes.agent_name: Jaguar Land Rover The Glen Used
attributes.description:
OFFER NOT TO BE MISSED!

extras include:
- 21"inch mags
- Electronic Air suspension with All terrain progress control
- Rear axle locking differential 
- Roof sliding panoramic 
- Memory seats (front)
-  Front foglamps
- Navigation centre
- TFT instrument cluster
- Meridian sound
- Sat Navigation centre
- Ambient lighting
- Cruise control
- Keyless entry push  stop / start
- Park distance control (Front and Rear ) with front and reverse camera
- Lane departure warning
- Ebony headlining
- Powered tailgate
- Reverse traffic detection
- Towbar and many more wonderful standard features
